\begin{eqnarray}
\left\vert \Psi_M; P^+, {\vec P_\perp}, \lambda \right> &=&
%\nonumber \\ &&
\sum_{n \ge 2,\lambda_i} \int \Pi^{n}_{i=1} \frac{d^2k_{\perp i}

 \times 16 \pi^3 \delta\left(1- \sum^n_j x_j\right) \delta^{(2)}
\left(\sum^n_\ell \vec k_{\perp \ell}\right) \\[1ex]
&&\times \left\vert n; x_i P^+, x_i {\vec P_\perp} + {\vec
k_{\perp i}}, \lambda_i\right
> \psi_{n/M}(x_i,{\vec k_{\perp i}},\lambda_i)  .\nonumber

\begin{eqnarray}
{\mathcal H}_{int}&=&
  -g \,{{\overline\psi}}^{i}
\gamma^{\mu}{A_{\mu}}^{ij}{{\psi}}^{j}   \nonumber \\
&& +\frac{g}{2}\, f^{abc} \,(\partial_{\mu}{A^{a}}_{\nu}-
\partial_{\nu}{A^{a}}_{\mu}) A^{b\mu} A^{c\nu} \nonumber \\
&& +\frac {g^2}{4}\,
f^{abc}f^{ade} {A_{b\mu}} {A^{d\mu}} A_{c\nu} A^{e\nu} \nonumber \\
&& - \frac{g^{2}}{ 2}\,\, {{\overline\psi}}^{i} \gamma^{+}
\,(\gamma^{\perp'}{A_{\perp'}})^{ij}\,\frac{1}{i\partial_{-}} \,
(\gamma^{\perp} {A_{\perp}})^{jk}\,{\psi}^{k} \nonumber \\
&& -\frac{g^{2}}{ 2}\,{j^{+}}_{a}\, \frac
{1}{(\partial_{-})^{2}}\, {j^{+}}_{a}
\
